title: English Proficiency Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of the English language with this quiz covering a variety of topics, from geography to literature and science. Answer questions related to capitals, famous authors, oceans, and more to assess your English proficiency.

items.question: What is the capital of Australia?
Who wrote the play 'Romeo and Juliet'?
What is the largest ocean in the world?
Which country is known as the 'Land of the Rising Sun'?
What is the chemical formula for water?
Which U.S. state is known as the 'Lone Star State'?
What is the name of the largest planet in our solar system?
Which artist painted the famous work 'The Starry Night'?
What is the name of the tallest mountain in the world?
Which city is known as the 'City of Lights'?
